note: He has written The Black Death (Greenwood, 2004), Daily Life during the Black Death (Greenwood, 2006), and Encyclopedia of the Black Death
title: BYRNE is a historian and professor of humanities in the Honors Program at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
and edited the Encyclopedia of Pestilence, Pandemics, and Plagues
He serves as series editor of Health and Wellness in Daily Life
